bibl.title: New Testament Greek Manuscripts. Variant Readings Arranged in Horizontal Lines Against Codex Vaticanus: Galatians. Foreword by Bruce METZGER.
bibl.note: Includes the evidence of P. Chester Beatty II Supplement + P. Mich. III, 222 and P. Oxy. XVIII, 2157 (= van Haelst 497; 516).
bibl.seg: SWANSON Reuben J., New Testament Greek Manuscripts. Variant Readings Arranged in Horizontal Lines Against Codex Vaticanus: Galatians. Foreword by Bruce METZGER.
Wheaton, Ill., Tyndale House - Pasadena, Ca., W. Carey, 1999, 8Â°, xxxi-135 pp. ISBN 0-8423-3974-4. $18.95.
Includes the evidence of P. Chester Beatty II Supplement + P. Mich. III, 222 and P. Oxy. XVIII, 2157 (= van Haelst 497; 516).
C.R. par J.K. Elliott, NT 43 (2001) pp. 178-180.
